title: Rename site/blog branding to “MHS Habibur Blog” and add 5 new professional posts

requirements.text: Update the site/blog branding text from "MyBlog" to "MHS Habibur Blog" anywhere it is shown to users, including the header brand text, site-wide config metadata, and footer copyright.

quotes: Please change the blog title from 'MyBlog' to 'MHS Habibur Blog'.

acceptanceCriteria: Header brand text shows exactly “MHS Habibur Blog” (no remaining “MyBlog” in the header).
Footer copyright line shows “© {year} MHS Habibur Blog. All rights reserved.”.
A case-sensitive search for the standalone string “MyBlog” in user-facing UI text no longer finds the old title (excluding URLs like https://myblog.com if still present).

requirements.text: Write and add 5 professional, reader-useful blog posts focused on “Online Income” and “Digital Marketing” to the blog section by updating the sample fallback posts used by the Blog list/detail pages (`frontend/src/lib/blogSampleFallback.ts`). Each post must include a catchy title, a unique URL-safe slug, a clear excerpt, substantial content, and a realistic published timestamp.

quotes: please write and add 5 professional blog posts about 'Online Income' and 'Digital Marketing' to the blog section. Make sure each post has a catchy title and useful information for the readers.

acceptanceCriteria: `samplePosts` contains exactly 5 posts and all 5 are about Online Income and/or Digital Marketing (remove/replace the existing generic web-dev sample posts).
Each post has: non-empty `title`, unique `slug`, non-empty `excerpt`, non-empty `content`, and a valid `published` timestamp.
Blog list page renders 5 cards and each navigates to a working detail page for its slug.
Post content is professional, actionable, and formatted as readable multi-paragraph text (not a single short paragraph).

requirements.text: Update the static sitemap (`frontend/public/sitemap.xml`) so it includes the blog post URLs for the 5 new blog post slugs and removes URLs for any deleted/replaced sample posts.

quotes: write and add 5 professional blog posts... to the blog section

acceptanceCriteria: `frontend/public/sitemap.xml` includes `<url><loc>.../blog/{slug}</loc>...</url>` entries for all 5 new slugs.
`frontend/public/sitemap.xml` does not list blog post URLs for any removed/replaced sample slugs.

constraints: Do not edit files under `frontend/src/components/ui` (compose them instead).
Do not modify any frontend immutable paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT (e.g., `frontend/src/main.tsx`, `frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts`, `frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts/tsx`).
Backend remains single-actor; do not introduce additional backend services.
nonGoals: Implementing a CMS/admin UI for creating/editing blog posts.
Adding third-party integrations (analytics, email, social APIs, external databases).
Changing the site theme/colors/layout beyond what is required for the title/branding and new post content.
